item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
It doesn't matter if people praise me or curse me because in the end, I know where I stand and that's what matters most to me.
They give me shitty value, they praise me to the sky, they ignore me even with me standing infront of them, It never bothers me and NEVER WILL.

It's like a superhuman power given to me by the lord grace.
I always knew there was a reason why I could always stay away from all this praises and curses and maybe just maybe I wasn't the one who was worth all those.

I feel happy at times for myself but never too boastful about what I did good or bad. Others' feeling on those never gave me joy but my satisfaction on what I did gave me joy.

I wish that super human power never leave me with time.

item.title: F.R.I.E.N.D.S
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
Relax it's not about the American epic dramatic TV show. But I wish things were like that.

I'm probably not in a terrific mood today. Trust me I have my reasons.

You know what I realized, You don't call friends "friends" when you gotta tell them what and why it is about even before calling them.
You call them friends when they pick up your line and starts listening with their full attention and give you their full ears without hesitating and most importantly not raising the Why? question.

Maybe it isn't their fault after all. It might be yours. How right!
for starters, it was you who thought and called them 'friends' in the first place. Bad luck boy. It is you whose choices that made every change to this point. If you drifted away from that particular moment that made you to meet and slowly become friends, you wouldn't have become their friend and probably wouldn't have gotten this hurt.

Time isn't it. Slow as a snail and yet powerful as a knife.
No one asked you for anything and still why are you expecting those from the ones you call friends.

I don't say every one of your friends are like that. Some doesn't bother your call and even loves to talk to you even if they're occupied with their things, and there're some who wouldn't mind calling you back as soon as you leave a missed call.

Deal with it bro. You're the one who failed in choosing the so called right 'friends' and it is not your fault you don't have a friendship like the 6 had in F.R.I.E.N.D.S.

Any Regrets? I would say NEVER coz even though everything seems out of place, We're friends and will always be.

n.b. this was purely about me and me only. I think I criticized myself. Screw it.

item.title: untitled
item.description: Whether you should or not. Read more..
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
• You should live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in the world.
  • You should do things for the people who can go behind your back.
  • You should swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you.
  • You should trust everyone blindly.
  • You should expect things from everyone.
  • You should be friends mean people.
  • You shouldn't love anyone unconditionally but yourself.
  • You shouldn't feel pain in anyway.

You wanna know why!

  • You should live a life that you may wanna live to please all the people in the world then only you'll understand that there's more to life much more enjoyable than living a life to please everyone.
  • You should do things for the people who can go behind your back that makes you understand people's true double faced fickle mindedness.
  • You should swim ocean for people who won't even cross a bridge for you that way reality hits and leaves you broken like the leaf fell from the tree.
  • You should trust everyone blindly that way you'll know the pain that comes with it.
  • You should expect things from everyone which when they fail you, you get to know that expectations hurt and things n people are temporary.
  • You should be friends with mean people as then you can see how ruthlessly they can bring you to rockbottom.
  • You shouldn't love anyone unconditionally but yourself that way when people you love leave you, you won't be left in vain.
  • You shouldn't feel pain in anyway coz if you do feel it, it'll make you do the dont's and not do the do's as I told here.

Do/Don't.
It's our choice that leads life to take turns.
Choose happiness over anything. In the end it is what matters and you of all the people in world deserve to love and to be loved to the fullest.

item.title: Faces
item.description: Blog Post about Peoples' faces. Read more..
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
Strange thing happened today. I forgot faces.
Sounds funny I know but it's true and quite a lot embarrassing.
How can I forget faces of people I know or at least I used to know so easily at my 20's!!

I was embarrassed when those 2 friends asked me if I didn't recognise them at all. One of them I see usually in the bus while on the way to college and the other I see while on bus back to home.

Seriously this is the second time I'm up with this issue.
Am I forgetting things so easily.

I can't say I didn't expect this as nowadays I spend most of the time in my room engaging in things I love.

Embarrassing was it, quite embarrassing.

You may be wondering why write a blog for this right!
WHOOPAH

item.title: Pity, Sorry, Forgive
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
yet another hashtag added to the list.

AND?? Is this cycle gonna end someday!!!

So we want our country to be known for this kinda shame! Alright then.

DUMB COUNTRY of FILTHY MUD-HEAD B*tches as of now.

she was just an 8 year old and you all did this to her, that poor little girl.

Pity on you all

What if it happened to your child instead!

It’s not just you few who did this to her, we all were a part of the unfortunate crime. We chose this to happen when we were busy planning on making Huge Statues of the dead, fighting over parties, instead of thinking about to make for the betterment and safety. Alas!

Sorry that we did this to you sister

Too bad that our mind is so dark that our actions drive us to what we do.

They say it is what it is and what’s done is done but why is it still not changing considering this, not the first time in India

Forgive us for what’s done

Too much to wish for.

But forgive us for being the reason that you went through this misery at this age.

Forgive us for crushing your poor soul, taking the life out of you child.

Is this going to be the last? I presume not coz it’s our country after all.

-> Don’t make this about about just the government or the parties.
-> Don’t make this about Men vs Women.
-> Make this about Us against the monsters out there within us.

I seriously can’t bear seeing another picture of you with the pretty face of yours torn apart.

May you rest in peace little sister.

Not gonna use the J word anyway

-A

item.title: Silence
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
The word so close to Fear, or maybe that which troubles us to feel fear.

When the whole world stands still and then we hear the clock’s ticking, that when dark, shades our mind and fear takes it as a whole making us see where we stand.

When the silence hits our ears, shall we have a feeling of something strange, or the sense of wrong, dripping with perspiration.

  • Has it ever occurred to you something like that, like when it’s all silent around you and then you starts to sweat and some thoughts starts rushing to your mind from nowhere, making you feel like you’re lost and left far behind everything?

Maybe not.

But I have had that sensation.

Listen to the silence

ehh listen to silence huh? You probably are wondering.

Yeah there’s a lot of voice within the silence but shall only be heard by the one’s who’s actually listening to the silence.

There shall be no fear in the mist of silence if you of all are going with it

–A

item.title: F Me
item.description: Blog Post on Peoples' priorities. Read more..
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
Priories, The Only f’kin thing that matters.

The thing that tears the paper apart

Too bad everyone’s a part of this so called era of priorities, selfishness, and most importantly the era where people take things for granted.

Should’ve known that all are same

One I love told me to find someone worthy, to talk to.

Too bad I lost her too.

Let her have her priorities seeking what’s best for her, I don’t complain

Wish I knew it sooner that it is what it is.

su*ks isn’t it when the world you see just flip with you standing there unaffected.

The turns life take, Awesome.

All the best to me in finding the things I seek in the random distorted world with so called prioritizing creatures

Life su*ks

Trust me

Life fkin sucks

–A

item.title: The pursuit of Happiness
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
It’s with great happiness that find myself writing this. I never thought I could perform a bit better than I used to be in one of the game which I actually was afraid of. By afraid I mean It’s a game with a lot of co-players you know, so everytime I make a fool of myself in front of everyone, I somehow actually made my mind to hate the game slowly. But guess what, with all the teasing and insulting and criticizing, I’m now starting to learn more and trying to be much focussed at instants. Kidding though.

That doesn’t mean I’m way better now. 🙂 I’m trying at least.(lol)

Maybe just maybe, someday I could look back and say Hey I wasn’t AFRAID….

item.title: living as I like a.k.a Life is awesome
item.dc:creator: Abhijith Vijayan
item.content:encoded:
Did I make a mistake on living like the way I want to rather than looking for from the people? I guess not but still Why do I feel like I’m lot behind all and I lost self-respect!

I’m not a big fan of people living on others words and choices. Also I’m not a big fan of people intruding in others life and judging others’ actions and all.

Why don’t they look for themselves and lead a good life!

What is that they’re gaining from these kinda sadist attitude, guess I’ll never know.

btw people have a perception about me that I FLAUNT too much, hehe lol 🙂 Maybe they’re right or maybe they’re wrong but what gives!

It’s only a life that’s given to us, so why not use it to the fullest!

flaunt a little, enjoy a little, be crazy for a little, and moreover live the way you like.

-A
